name: South Ufagari Shore
description: The coast of the island is entirely surrounded by rocky hills. The southern cliff edge is the lowest on the island. A few villagers sit on the edge, fishing.

name: Ufagari Village
description: A few houses and shops sit near the landing. The rest of the island is an open plain, with cliffs on all sides. A precious metals smithy is operating at the center of the village.

buildings.name: Ufagari Smithy
buildings.description: The smithy is specially designed to handle precious metals. You can make silver, gold or platinum necklaces here.

name: Ufagari Fields
description: The fields to the east of the village are home to strange beasts and totem poles.

name: Ufagari Landing
description: A newly constructed building sits at the edge of the cliffs. Rope ladders and winches provide a way up from the boat below.
